mapper.select: select count(classify_id) from t_info_goods_classify where is_delete = 0 and classify_id= #{classifyId}
select count(*) from t_info_goods_classify where is_delete = 0 and classify_parent= #{classifyId}
mapper.insert: insert into t_info_goods_classify (classify_name, classify_comment, classify_parent, is_delect, create_user, create_time, version ) values (#{classifyName}, #{classifyComment}, #{classifyParent}, 0, #{createUser}, now(), 0)
mapper.select: select classify_name, classify_comment from t_info_goods_classify where classify_id = #{classifyId} and is_delete = 0

select a.classify_id, a.classify_name, a.version, (select b.classify_id, b.classify_name, b.version from t_info_goods_classify b where is_delete = 0 and b.classify_parent = a.classify_id order by update_time desc) from t_info_goods_classify a where is_delete = 0 and classify_parent = 0 order by update_time desc
mapper.update: update t_info_goods_classify set user_acct = #{classifyName}, user_password = #{classifyComment}, update_time = now(), update_user = #{updateUser}, version = version + 1 where classify_id = #{classifyId} and version = #{version}
